doc:
John Adam (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Adam_(actor) 0 John Adam is an Australian television and theatre actor. He has had three roles in the soap opera Home and Away as Dave Porter (1990), Luke Cunningham (1993–94) and Senior Detective Atticus Decker (2016). From 2009 until the series' cancellation, Adam starred as Detective Senior Constable Nick Buchanan in City Homicide. He has also appeared in Water Rats, All Saints and Neighbours, as well as various theatre productions. John_Adam is an_Australian_television_and_theatre_actor . He has_had three_roles in the_soap_opera_Home and Away as Dave_Porter_(_1990_) , Luke_Cunningham_(_1993 – 94_)_and_Senior_Detective_Atticus_Decker_(_2016_) . From 2009 until the_series_'_cancellation , Adam starred as Detective_Senior_Constable_Nick_Buchanan in City_Homicide . He has_also_appeared in Water_Rats , All_Saints_and_Neighbours , as_well_as various_theatre_productions .
